channel.title: Extrepo doesn't include Trixie
channel.description:
In Debian's extrepo-data, Kicksecure repo doesn't include Trixie.
https://salsa.debian.org/extrepo-team/extrepo-data/-/blob/master/repos/debian/kicksecure.yaml?ref_type=heads
Can anyone help me issue a pull request to fix it or make an issue in the project? I don't have an account on Salsa Gitlab.
Thank you

item.title: Extrepo doesn't include Trixie
item.dc:creator: arraybolt3
item.description:
Debian Salsa is Debian’s official Git forge, and it is a Gitlab instance. While I don’t know for certain if that specific extrepo repository is the official one upstream, I wouldn’t be surprised if it was, and extrepo is part of Debian. Our documentation recommends using it in some areas, so it would be good if it were kept up-to-date. I may be able to get the time to submit a fix upstream to re-enable the Trixie repo now that we have one.

Read full topic

item.title: Extrepo doesn't include Trixie

item.description:
Is that even official I didn’t think it was on Gitlab?

Read full topic
